title: Spout
contents: text | <span style='font-size:8px'> Water blasts upward, coming out of the ground, rising from a pool, or even manifesting from thin air. Any creatures in the area take bludgeoning damage equal to 1d4 plus your spellcasting ability modifier, with a basic Reflex saving throw.

text | <span style='font-size:8px'> You can change this spell's area to a 5-foot burst, provided you center the burst in a body of water. This body of water can be as small as a pond or creek, but not as small as a puddle or bathtub.
text | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

title: Shield
contents: property | Duration | until the start of your next turn

text | <span style='font-size:8px'> Raise a magical shield (Raise a Shield action), giving you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC for duration, w/o requiring a hand to use. The shield has Hardness 5. Heightening increases.
text | <span style='font-size:8px'> While in effect, gain reaction. After using reaction, you can't cast it again for 10 minutes. You can use reaction against the magic missile spell.
text | Shield Block [reaction] Trigger w/ shield raised, you take dmg from a physical attack. Ward off a blow w/ shield. Prevents you from taking dmg up to Hardness.

title: Shield (continued)
contents: text | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightening the spell increases the shield's Hardness.
description | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightened (3rd) | <span style='font-size:8px'>  The shield has Hardness 10.
description | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightened (5th) | <span style='font-size:8px'>  The shield has Hardness 15.
description | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightened (7th) | <span style='font-size:8px'>  The shield has Hardness 20.
description | <span style='font-size:8px'> Heightened (9th) | <span style='font-size:8px'>  The shield has Hardness 25.
